title: Star Wars: Jedi Academy Playthrough -- Part 1
description: Finally getting around to this game. So far it's pretty great, maybe slightly better than Jedi Outcast in some ways. They're both fantastic
gameName: Star Wars: Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy
